title: Flight Simulator 2020 -  How to - A320 V2 - help I cannot hear the ATC
description:
This video will outline the necessary steps to ensure that you can use and hear ATC communications when operating the A320 V2. The procedures may vary based on the aircraft's status, but we will focus on starting from the 'cold and dark' state, which involves initiating the aircraft's systems from the beginning.
